message.body: How many limes should I get for pies??
We need a full cup for two pies. So probably a while bag!
I have a citrus juicer. It does a good job. I think we will need like 12-14
Hey! Are you around tomorrow afternoon to make pies instead? If not today is cool! :)
Yeah we can do tmw!
Hunter and I are getting dinner in north philly kinda early so I can pick up some things but I'll just be at home cleaning and working
Cool! I will get supplies for pies today and a few other things. Will you be around later this afternoon? I was thinking I could drop some stuff off...
What time is good for you tomorrow?
I should be! I might run some errands so just text me when you wanna drop things. I am gonna make a run to temple at some Point.
Wanna try for 1 pm. Hunter and I will probably leave around 5 or 5:30
You sure tomorrow is ok for you?? Don't want to mess anything up :/
Sounds great!!
Yeah tomorrow totally works. Plus the pies will be fresher.
Ok cool! Looking forward to it! :)
Gonna be hard to wait to eat those pies!
We should probably make a third pie. Just for us.
I think I have stuff to make a coconut cream pie too if we wanna make all kinds Of pies.
So you have tree/bush clippers? I wanna trim back some of the bushes in the back yard to make room
Haha yes! A third pie to eat right away!!
I do have trimmers
I can bring them by later or with me tomorrow
What kinda snacks should I get for Saturday?
Gonna go to grocery later.
Hummus
We're gonna have pies and some beers...so maybe chips, dip salsa, fruit...shit like that...
Yeah! Crackers, cheese (people love cheese), cool ranch Doritos, pirates booty, an olive plate, cherries
Some kind of chi late covered thing
Chocolate!
A vegetable plate? But that's last on the list.
